Title: The Greatest Prank
Description:
So riddles three you answered me. Good good. The Monkey King is not so old that he tells just anyone his tricks.

It was the greatest prank ever!

You want to hear story of the Mallet and the Monkey? Too bad! No choice!
ObjectivesText: Listen to the Monkey King's story.
RewardText:
It looks like it is going to take us a few days to track all of these "minions" down.

Thank you for your help, $n. Meet me in Lion's Landing in a few days and we will embark to track down these objects.

Objectives.Text: Listen to the Monkey King's Story
